channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring -- Spring Cloud Data Flow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spring -- Spring Cloud Data Flow

item.title: CVE-2024-37084|2024-08-02T03:43:50.987Z -- spring -- spring%20cloud%20data%20flow
item.description: In Spring Cloud Data Flow versions prior to 2.11.4, a malicious user who has access to the Skipper server api can use a crafted upload request to write an arbitrary file to any location on the file system which could lead to compromising the server

item.title: CVE-2024-37084|2024-07-25T09:17:50.378Z -- spring -- spring%20cloud%20data%20flow
item.description: In Spring Cloud Data Flow versions prior to 2.11.4, a malicious user who has access to the Skipper server api can use a crafted upload request to write an arbitrary file to any location on the file system which could lead to compromising the server

item.title: CVE-2024-37084|2024-07-25T13:38:12.037Z -- spring -- spring%20cloud%20data%20flow
